thread.title: John Stamos expected to face criminal charges following June DUI arrest - Showbiz
thread.title_full: John Stamos expected to face criminal charges following June DUI arrest - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: John Stamos expected to face criminal charges following June DUI arrest - Showbiz
text: John Stamos is expected to face criminal charges over his arrest for driving under the influence.Stamos was stopped by the authorities in June and was subsequently hospitalised for medical treatment. Â© Getty Images / Jason Merritt Los Angeles prosecutors have spent the last few months investigating the matter and have reached the decision to imminently file charges, according to TMZ.Almost immediately following his arrest, Stamos entered a residential rehab programme for 30 days of treatment.Stamos has since emerged from rehab, and continues work on both Fox's Grandfathered and the Netflix revival of Full House.The actor has yet to comment publicly on the possibility of facing criminal charges.
